heading: High-Tier Infrastructure (IT & Telecom)
description: We master the "Physical Layer" of connectivity. From fiber optic backhaul and core server installation to precision Data Center commissioning and layout design, we ensure 100% operational resilience.

heading: Intelligent Warehousing & Smart Logistics
description: We transform traditional facilities into high-velocity fulfillment centers. By integrating AI-driven WMS/ERP systems and IoT hardware ecosystems, we move beyond simple management into predictive restocking and throughput optimization.

heading: Multi-Sector Contract Manufacturing
description: Protek bridges the gap between concept and launch. We provide end-to-end R&D and manufacturing across the Beauty, Health, Auto, and IT sectors, using Nielsen and POS data to inform production and optimize sales.

heading: Digital Commerce & Market Acceleration
description: We ensure your brand does not just launch, it dominates. We build the e-commerce architecture and deploy AI-driven marketing strategies to own the digital shelf on Amazon and custom platforms.
